column1: Business Administration - Strategy and Management in International Organisations

In the two-year master’s programme in Business Administration - Strategy and Management in International Organizations (SMIO) we aim to educate future leaders with good judgment, who can analyse complex problems and make well-balanced decisions.
Citizens from within the EU/EEA and Switzerland: No tuition fees. All others: 177,600 SEK (approx.16,500 USD/ 15,300 Euro)
